programme.title: Man And A Baby
programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.

programme.title: Train Driver's Diary
programme.desc: As Ilija nears retirement, his record of unintentional deaths as a train driver weighs heavy. His adopted son, Sima, fears following in his footsteps. But as days pass without incident, Ilija's determination to ensure Sima's success takes a dark turn.

programme.title: The Breach
programme.desc: A fatal car crash shudders a crisis-torn family. Completely lost and shaken to the core by his wife’s death, the husband undertakes his own investigation and learns the shattering truth about his spouse’s genuine woes and longings.

programme.title: Commitment Asli
programme.desc: Asli is a young mother struggling to reconcile her commitments as a mother and wife with her professional career. She hires Gulnihal, a nanny and a fellow mother, but whose arrival forces Asli to confront the secrets she has been avoiding.

programme.title: Our Children
programme.desc: A doctor brings a boy to Belgium and raises him as his own. When the boy reaches manhood, he gets married and starts his own family, but he still relies on the doctor, his adoptive father. When trouble strikes his family, dependence turns into domination.

programme.title: The Black Minutes
programme.desc: Vicente Rangel, a musician turned detective, embarks on a police case to catch a murderer of girls in a corrupt oil town on the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: Man And A Baby
programme.desc: Dad (Antti) is left alone with a newborn after the mom (Pia) decides motherhood is not her thing. Single dad tries to survive alone in "women's world" and keep the baby and himself alive.

programme.title: Brado
programme.desc: An estranged father-son duo find themselves reunited when the father needs help running the family ranch after an injury. As they train a rebellious horse for a cross-country race, the pair learns to rebuild their relationship and heal from their pain.

programme.title: Blizzard of Souls
programme.desc: After losing his mother and his home, Arturs finds some consolation in joining the army. However, war is nothing like he imagined.

programme.title: Murder In The Vercors
programme.desc: In a rural mountain village, a shepherd is found murdered. Suspicion falls on a former teacher, who used to date the victim’s teenage nephew. When the nephew returns to aid the case, tension and buried animosities in the peaceful community erupt.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: Forever-Forever
programme.desc: In late 90s Kyiv, rebellious Tonia joins a gang, seeking protection and belonging. Amidst the ruins of the post-soviet city, she finds herself tangled up in a secret love triangle and confronting her abusive past.

programme.title: Surro
programme.desc: A surrogate mother wants to meet the child she once carried but is hindered by a valid written agreement.

programme.title: Premiere Affaire
programme.desc: Nora, a young and an inexperienced criminal defense lawyer is charged with the case of a teenage boy accused of murdering a neighbour.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: The Black Minutes
programme.desc: Vicente Rangel, a musician turned detective, embarks on a police case to catch a murderer of girls in a corrupt oil town on the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: Brado
programme.desc: An estranged father-son duo find themselves reunited when the father needs help running the family ranch after an injury. As they train a rebellious horse for a cross-country race, the pair learns to rebuild their relationship and heal from their pain.

programme.title: Murder In The Vercors
programme.desc: In a rural mountain village, a shepherd is found murdered. Suspicion falls on a former teacher, who used to date the victim’s teenage nephew. When the nephew returns to aid the case, tension and buried animosities in the peaceful community erupt.

programme.title: Needle Park Baby
programme.desc: Based on the autobiography by Michelle Halbneer, “Needle Park Baby” recounts the unbelievable story of an eleven-year-old girl and a childhood growing up with heroin addicted parents set in Platzspitzpark, Zurich’s public drug scene in the nineties.

programme.title: The Apple of My Eye
programme.desc: Elise is beautiful, funny, and blind. Theo is a seducer but a loser. They love music. But when they meet in the elevator, it's hate at first sight.

programme.title: Forever-Forever
programme.desc: In late 90s Kyiv, rebellious Tonia joins a gang, seeking protection and belonging. Amidst the ruins of the post-soviet city, she finds herself tangled up in a secret love triangle and confronting her abusive past.

programme.title: Our Children
programme.desc: A doctor brings a boy to Belgium and raises him as his own. When the boy reaches manhood, he gets married and starts his own family, but he still relies on the doctor, his adoptive father. When trouble strikes his family, dependence turns into domination.

programme.title: Surro
programme.desc: A surrogate mother wants to meet the child she once carried but is hindered by a valid written agreement.

programme.title: Premiere Affaire
programme.desc: Nora, a young and an inexperienced criminal defense lawyer is charged with the case of a teenage boy accused of murdering a neighbour.

programme.title: Murders In Corr èze
programme.desc: In the midst of a historic procession in Tulle, the mutilated body of an artist is found on the sidelines of the crowds. Detectives Axel and Lena, former lovers who have not met in 13 years, are forced to overcome personal grievances and work together.

programme.title: Oddball
programme.desc: An eccentric chicken farmer, with the help of his granddaughter, trains his mischievous dog Oddball to protect a penguin sanctuary from fox attacks in an attempt to reunite his family and save their seaside town.

programme.title: Fig Tree
programme.desc: Addis Ababa, 1989. In the midst of the Ethiopian Civil War, a 16-year-old Jewish girl Mina attempts to save her Christian boyfriend Eli from being drafted into Mengistu Haile Mariam’s army just as her family is set to escape to Israel.

programme.title: Room 514
programme.desc: When Anna, a young, idealistic Israeli military investigator, confronts an elite officer with accusations of unnecessary violence against a Palestinian man in the Occupied Territories, her integrity and determination are challenged.

programme.title: El Alamein – The Line of Fire
programme.desc: Against a backdrop of searing daytime heat and chilling nighttime cold, three-time Italian Academy Awards winner Enzo Monteleone paints a gritty, powerful WW II epic of the Italian army’s battle with the Germans to drive Allied Forces from North Africa.

programme.title: Which Side
programme.desc: Aji and Mamat, two members from different village head candidate camps, are fighting for the votes of Kusno, an old man who is known to be honest and difficult to bribe in his village. To get Kusno's vote, they must find Jamal who is missing.

programme.title: One Floor Below
programme.desc: After being the sole unfortunate witness to a domestic quarrel that ends up in a murder, Patrascu finds himself at odds with two very close neighbours: one is the bizarre murderer. The other is his very own conscience.
